mapper.select: SELECT *, ((SELECT COUNT(cr_idx) AS cnt FROM cp_camping_review WHERE cr_assessment = '좋아요' AND ca_idx = a.ca_idx) - (SELECT COUNT(cr_idx) AS cnt FROM cp_camping_review WHERe cr_assessment = '싫어요' AND ca_idx = a.ca_idx)) AS ranking from cp_camping a ORDER BY ranking desc limit 4 offset 0

SELECT *, ((SELECT COUNT(cr_idx) AS cnt FROM cp_camping_review WHERE cr_assessment = '좋아요' AND ca_idx = a.ca_idx) - (SELECT COUNT(cr_idx) AS cnt FROM cp_camping_review WHERe cr_assessment = '싫어요' AND ca_idx = a.ca_idx)) AS ranking from cp_camping a where ca_sido = (SELECT mb_sido FROM cp_member WHERE mb_id = #{mb_id}) ORDER BY ranking desc limit 4 offset 0;

SELECT a.ct_idx, a.ct_wish_start, a.ct_wish_end, a.ct_title, a.ct_age, a.ct_people_cnt, a.ct_end, a.ct_gender, a.mb_id, b.ca_img, b.ca_sido, b.ca_name, c.mb_nickname FROM cp_crew_together a JOIN cp_camping b ON a.ca_idx = b.ca_idx JOIN cp_member c ON a.mb_id = c.mb_id WHERE a.ca_idx = #{ca_idx} AND a.ct_end = 0
